summary.para: Determines if the metadata handler requires a fixed size.

param.name: pfFixedSize
param.para: Type: BOOL*
Pointer that receives TRUE if a fixed size is required; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines if the handler requires a full stream.

param.name: pfRequiresFullStream
param.para: Type: BOOL*
Pointer that receives TRUE if a full stream is required; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines if the metadata handler supports padding.

param.name: pfSupportsPadding
param.para: Type: BOOL*
Pointer that receives TRUE if padding is supported; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the container formats supported by the metadata handler.

param.name: cContainerFormats
param.para: Type: UINT
The size of the pguidContainerFormats array.

param.name: pguidContainerFormats
param.para: Type: GUID*
Pointer to an array that receives the container formats supported by the metadata handler.

param.name: pcchActual
param.para: Type: UINT*
The actual number of GUIDs added to the array.
To obtain the number of supported container formats, pass NULL to pguidContainerFormats.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the device manufacturer of the metadata handler.

param.name: cchDeviceManufacturer
param.para: Type: UINT
The size of the wzDeviceManufacturer buffer.

param.name: wzDeviceManufacturer
param.para: Type: WCHAR*
Pointer to the buffer that receives the name of the device manufacturer.

param.name: pcchActual
param.para: Type: UINT*
The actual string buffer length needed to obtain the entire name of the device manufacturer.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the device models that support the metadata handler.

param.name: cchDeviceModels
param.para: Type: UINT
The length of the wzDeviceModels buffer.

param.name: wzDeviceModels
param.para: Type: WCHAR*
Pointer that receives the device models supported by the metadata handler.

param.name: pcchActual
param.para: Type: UINT*
The actual length needed to retrieve the device models.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the metadata format of the metadata handler.

param.name: pguidMetadataFormat
param.para: Type: GUID*
Pointer that receives the metadata format GUID.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that provide basic information about the registered metadata handler.
